message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.AI 

This paper deals with person re-identification in camera networks, which is a computer vision problem, hence it is likely to belong to the cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) category. The paper also proposes a unified framework that jointly solves both person re-id and camera network topology inference problems, which involves machine learning and optimization techniques, hence it could also belong to the cs.MM (Multimedia) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) categories. The paper also discusses the challenges of handling large-scale multi-camera networks, which could make it relevant to the cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) category. Finally, the paper proposes a new dataset for person re-id, which involves data collection and annotation, hence it could also belong to the cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) category.
